ğ—ğ“ğŒ ğ‚ğ¥ğ¨ğ®ğ 13.6 ğˆğ§ğ­ğ«ğ¨ğğ®ğœğğ¬ ğ‚ğ¥ğ¨ğ¬ğğ ğğğ­ğš ğ…ğğšğ­ğ®ğ«ğ ğ°ğ¢ğ­ğ¡ ğğ©ğğ§ğ€ğˆ ğ†ğğ“ ğˆğ§ğ­ğğ ğ«ğšğ­ğ¢ğ¨ğ§ XTM International has announced a closed beta feature that integrates OpenAI GPT into XTM Cloud 13.6, marking a significant advancement in translation technology. This feature emphasizes user privacy and customization, allowing customers to process data through their own OpenAI subscriptions, ensuring full control over their information. Project managers can also enable or disable GPT for each language pair, providing tailored translation workflows. Sara Basile, Product Director, highlighted the companyâ€™s commitment to responsible AI use, ensuring users benefit from the latest technology while retaining data ownership. Future updates will include auto fuzzy completion, enhancing translation accuracy and fluency with GPTâ€™s contextual understanding. Additionally, XTM Cloud 13.6 introduces improvements such as streamlined XML file localization, parallel analysis of XLIFF files for Private Cloud customers, enhanced XTM API for more control and reporting options, and an improved Visual Mode for Adobe Experience Manager projects. For more details: https://lnkd.in/euN_SuHV #Translation #AI #LanguageTechnology #FutureOfTranslation #Innovation #DataSecurity #Customization #AIIntegration
